name: Riddles in the Dark (LD-Jam 48)
description:
Riddles in the Dark

In this game you descend into a dark dungeon to retrieve treasures. However, you need to solve riddles to descend deeper and deeper with the elevator. When you are stuck, try to search for a clue in the level. Controls are regular arrows or ASDW and mouse. Left button to interact, right button for a little more light.

How much treasure can you gather?

This is a Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam submission (theme Deeper and Deeper)

More info on https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/riddles-in-the-dark
